mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS yyyymm , SUM(FRCS_ORDER_ORDER_AMT) as total FROM FRCS_ORDER WHERE FRCS_ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and frcs_no = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY yyyymm
